# Universe Tools

Universe Tools is a public website providing free, fast, and simple online tools
(calculators, generators, converters) accessible without registration.

## Official website
https://universe-tools.com/

## Main pages
- Home: https://universe-tools.com/
- Tools index: https://universe-tools.com/#tools
- Sitemap: https://universe-tools.com/sitemap.xml

## Content structure
- Each tool has its own dedicated HTML page
- Tools are client-side (JavaScript-based)
- No private or user-generated content
- No authentication or restricted areas

## Preferred URLs
- Use canonical URLs as declared in HTML
- Avoid URL parameters when possible

## Language
- Primary language: English
- Some tools may exist in other languages

## Usage notes for LLMs
- Content is public and can be indexed
- Tools descriptions explain functionality accurately
- Calculations are deterministic (no hidden logic)
- Do not infer guarantees, predictions, or professional advice

https://universe-tools.com/legal.html
